channel.title: General on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in General on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - General - Enable / Disable Supplier
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - General - Enable / Disable Supplier Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1038 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/13_shopParameters/01_general/general/08_enableDisableSuppliers.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop Parameters -> General Page title contains ‘Preferences’ Enable Display suppliers > Save MessageÂ Successful update is displayed Go to BO > Catalog > Brands & Suppliers > Tab Suppliers Page title contains ‘Suppliers’

item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - General - Enable / Disable Brands
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - General - Enable / Disable Brands Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1039 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/13_shopParameters/01_general/general/09_enableDisableBrands.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Scroll down to footer > Click on Sitemap > Click on Brands See that Brands page is displayed. Go to BO > Catalog > Brands & Suppliers Blue alert is displayed : “The display of your brands is enabled on your store.
